attributes.action: Return Sex & Relationships education as a compulsory National Curriculum subject
attributes.additional_details: A core SRE programme should include: 1) Educating sexual consent, individual boundaries, rights & responsibilities 2) Educating sexual equality, diversity, orientation, relationships and respect for all the differences between us 3) Educating & safeguarding for safer sex & relationships including knowledge on STi's, pregnancy, relationship ethics, parenthood 4) Teach/learn the differences of fantasy/reality as young people use the internet to shape their opinions
attributes.background: Due to changes in Government policy, Education Secretary Ms Nicky Morgan took the strange decision to remove compulsory SRE from the core curriculum. We petition to have SRE reinstated & updated to reflect common sense, basic values, freedom of consensual sexual choices & other modern perspectives.
